page.title: 06A SCHOOL DAY CONT.
page.content: WHEN IT IS DINNER-TIME,WE PUT OUR BOOKS AWAY,PUT OUT THE TABLE-CLOTHS GO AND WASH IN THE TOILET BLOCK BEHIND THE SCHOOLROOM,DRY OUR HANDS ON THE TOWELS WE BRING FROM HOME,THEN WE COME IN AFTER LINING UP TO HAVE OUR HANDS INSPECTED BY THE DINING SUPERVISOR.WE STAND BY OUR CHAIR WITH OUR HANDS TOGETHER AND EYES CLOSED,SINGING THE GRACE IN FRENCH TO THE RECORDER.WE SIT DOWN TO EAT OUR DINNER.MOST CHILDREN BRING SANDWICHES.THE SCHOOL MEAL IS BROUGHT FROM FRIARN KITCHEN IN BRIDGWATER.AFTER DINNER,WE PLAY UNTIL 1.30PM.IN THE AFTERNOONS, WE DO HISTORY,GEOGRAPHY,P.E.,FRENCH, GERMAN AND DRAMA.ON FRIDAY WE DO ART.IT IS GREAT FUN.SCIENCE AND CRAFT-WORK ARE DONE ON MONDAY AND THURSDAY;WE WATCH SCHOOLS'T.V.ALSO.AFTER SCHOOL,WE PLAY ROUNDERS,NETBALL,CRICKET AND FOOTBALL. HOMEWORK LASTS HALF AN HOUR EACH NIGHT
